description:
Since the Panny D, there have been far too many scandals that should never have happened in America.

One of the worst ones was that international gang members have been terrorizing Americans for far too long. And not only should this have never happened, but the media and public officials mocked the victims as if they were the problems.

Aurora, CO police chief:

"Citizens were tortured. There is a high assumption they are affiliated with Tren de Aruaga."

"I had a discussion with the White House, they told me once these immigrants get across the border, that is all we care about."

WOW!

Donald Trump and all of… pic.twitter.com/862OMn3AQK
— AmericanPapaBear (@AmericaPapaBear)
title: Citizens Were "Tortured”: Police Chief Admits Venezuelan Gang Members Have Been Terrorizing Americans

description:
The fact that the majority of members of Congress have likely not taken the time to read over 1,500 pages of a spending bill dedicated to “special interest and pork funding,” proves that none of this is in your best interest.

So while the government is pretending they are jamming this through to help hurricane victims, which would not even be necessary had they not spent those funds on foreign nationals, that could not be further from the truth.

Call your elected representatives today to stop the steal of your tax dollars!
pic.twitter.com/6suIuQMcO4
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) December 18, 2024
title: Watch: Vivek Ramaswamy fires the first DOGE shot against Congress's newest spending bill

description:
The reason technocrats don’t censor flat earthers is because their claims are false, as the powers that be don’t censor incorrect information or lies, they censor things they don’t want you to know about.

Nonetheless, one former flat earther took a $35,000 trip just to be proven he's wrong.


NEW: Flat Earther travels all the way to Antarctica to prove that the Earth is flat only to find out that it's not.

Lmao.

Flat Earth YouTuber Jeran Campanella went on a $35,000 trip to prove that there was "no 24-hour sun."

"Sometimes you are wrong in life and I thought there… pic.twitter.com/8jvLWawB2J
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Watch: Flat Earther Who Tried To Prove Earth Is Flat Accidentally Finds Out... It’s Not

description:
Given that DEI is obviously illegal, American Airlines had no choice but to drop their racist policies, as you cannot hire solely based on skin color in this country.


/1 🚨✈️ BREAKING: American Airlines to end illegal DEI employment practices

The U.S. Department of Labor has confirmed that American Airlines will end race and sex-based discrimination in hiring and promotions following AFL’s federal civil rights complaint. pic.twitter.com/xSJBldct8n
— America First Legal (@America1stLegal) December 17, 2024
title: American Airlines Drops DEI Policies After Lawsuit

description:
A high school high school math teacher assigned a “coming out” exercise to her students and parents are speaking out, as this is deeply deranged.


🚨 A father rips into the Vista Unified School District Board after students at Rancho Buena Vista High School in California were put through an activist-séance during school hours.

“I don’t think this assignment should ever be taught to children. It does not do anything other… pic.twitter.com/Pz86QtYo4f
— rooted.wings (@BrittRooted) December 18, 2024


Acc
title: Watch: Based Dad Goes Off At School Board After Teacher Assigned Coming Out Assignment

description:
A Fat Pride spokesperson’s content went viral on social media after she was appointed by the City of San Francisco. Today’s show debunks claims and breaks down health complications associated with being overweight.

- YouTube
title: Watch: The True Cost of Fat Pride And How It's Destroying America

description:
President-elect Donald Trump has time to kill while he waits to be inaugurated. He's spending it suing media outlets. That is something CNN's Scott Jennings is a-ok with.

ABC News was willing to settle a defamation lawsuit against Trump to the tune of FIFTEEN MILLION DOLLARS. The president-elect has moved on to suing Iowa pollster Ann Selzer and 60 Minutes, alleging fraud and election interference with both. And while CNN is worried about being next, Jennings gets it and understands why Trump's doing this.

🚨🇺🇸 SCOTT JENNINGS: IOWA’S 'GOLD STANDARD POLL' WAS COMPLETE GARBAGE

"Rep
title: Watch: CNN's Scott Jennings thinks Donald Trump suing media organizations is awesome

description:
Turkish archeologists believe they have found the tomb of Saint Nicholas buried under the Saint Nicholas Church, we’re one month from President Donald Trump’s inauguration, and Trump’s relationship with President Xi of China may hinge on the fate of TikTok, a fat Pride spokesperson’s Fat Liberation content has prompted us to debunk claims and break down health complications associated with being overweight, meanwhile the debate over what is the top male physique has heated up on X, we’re here to settle it once and for all, and much more!

Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.
title: Sources: December 18

description:
San Francisco has appointed Virgie Tovar to assist in a department regarding all things “weight stigma and weight neutrality” because they deem this to be a real thing. And no, the city does not believe dealing with the zombie apocalypse or drug addict epidemic is more important than making weight stigma something neutral.

San Francisco just appointed Virgie Tovar as their Weight Stigma Czar pic.twitter.com/C6BPRC9xLe
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness
title: INSANE: San Francisco just appointed a (check notes) obese "Weight stigma and neutrality" consultant
